name: PatientsVille.com
overview:
PatientsVille.com, the leading source of consumer-reported drug side effect information, today announced the launch of a newly updated health information website. Its new set of features will engage drug consumers worldwide on the health and wellness issues that are most relevant to them.

The new PatientsVille.com home page features the top 200 drugs with most consumer-reported side effects and allows patients to view and report drug side effects. PatientsVille.com is leveraging the power of the Internet to change drug side effect awareness for consumers worldwide.

“The new PatientsVille.com health site is good for the patients worldwide,” said Tanya Miroff, Chief Executive, PatientsVille.com. “Consumers have access to side effect information in new and innovative ways, raising awareness and allowing them to reduce or avoid long-lasting drug side effects.â€

About PatientsVille.com

PatientsVille.com is the leading provider of consumer-reported drug side effects information, serving consumers, physicians, and healthcare professionals through our public online health.
